name: Embla's Trek
description:
A short adventure game where you play as Embla, a little witch sent into the forest to collect ingredients by her mother.

Made in collaboration with xXsamageXx  for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2022"!

CONTROLS

Move - Arrow Keys

Basket Checklist - Shift

Action - Spacebar

Watch out for the bears! They can be dangerous!

Will you find all the ingredients and make it home, safe and sound?

Credits

Art, music, sound, and UI - EpicLevelWizard

Programming and design - xXsamageXx
